arts.ttl: Cheltenham Town v Fleetwood Town RECAP: Robins booed off after calamitous display
arts.sum: His first came after Scot Bennett was caught in possession, with his second set up by Elliot Bonds, who left Cheltenham to join Fleetwood for a five-figure fee in the summer. Fleetwood Town: Harrington; Bolton, Wiredu, Hughes; Johnston, Virtue (Helm 85), Bonds, Mayor, Hunt; Graydon (Odubeko 85), Coughlan (Harratt 73).

arts.ttl: Matty Virtue double gives Fleetwood win at Cheltenham
arts.sum: The summer signing from Blackpool scored his first goals for the club.

arts.ttl: Cheltenham Town's former Dundee, Yeovil Town and Halifax Town defender Tom Bradbury's story so far
arts.sum: The left-footed defender has forced his way back into Cheltenham Town’s starting XI and is tasting League Two football for the first time after a summer of uncertainty. “Like at other clubs, even though I played 38 games in my first year I was never the main man, but I came back in the second year and it turned out to be a great season,” he says.
